name: generate_facebook_caption
description: Generate a Facebook caption for a post related to healing music, cinematic soundscapes, or emotional storytelling.

video_title.description: The title of the video or music being shared

theme.description: Emotional theme of the video (e.g., inner peace, loneliness, nostalgia)

target_audience.description: The intended audience (e.g., insomniacs, creatives, overthinkers)

style.description: Tone and writing style for the post

include_hashtags.description: Whether to include relevant hashtags at the end
